import re

def parse_string(string):
    string = re.sub('', '', string)
    words = re.split('\\s+', string.lower())
    return words

import re

def parse_string(string):
    string = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', string)
    words = re.split('\\s+', string.lower())
    return words

import re

def parse_string(string):
    string = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', string)
    words = re.split('', string.lower())
    return words
